WorkflowInfo.Name: Delete old snapshots from a list of virtual machines
WorkflowInfo.Description: Delete snapshots older than 30 days from a list of virtual machines
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:VMList;Assembly=VMList, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral,
